title: Akbar S. Babar’s allegations on foreign funding true: Shazia Marri
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 23 (APP): Pakistan Peoples Party’s Central Spokesperson Shazia Marri has said that Akbar S. Babar’s allegations on foreign funding are true,
She was talking to the media outside the Parliament House along with Abdul Qadir Patel and Agha Rafiullah. She said that Bilawal Bhutto Zardari is the face of Pakistan. He has achieved great success by fully representing Pakistan abroad. Shazia Marri said that the position of opposition leader is a respectable one. It is not known when the opposition leader is speaking.
Peoples Party leader Abdul Qadir Patel said that the opposition leader has been in every party, he should take care of his position. He said that Bilawal Bhutto is the future of Pakistan.
